Description: User:<image>Describe the image with details and give key words to describe the motifs. Assistant: The image depicts a pencil drawing of a two-story building. The building has a steeply pitched roof and a large door at the bottom. The door is flanked by two windows on each side. Above the door, there are two more windows on each side. The building has a rectangular shape, with the front facing the viewer. The drawing is done in a simple, sketchy style, with thin lines indicating the outlines of the building and its features. The artist has used shading to suggest the depth and dimension of the building. The drawing is signed by the artist, "1857," and dated "301114." The drawing is mounted on a piece of paper, which is slightly torn at the edges. The paper has a light beige color, and the drawing is positioned in the center of the page. The drawing is surrounded by a white border, which helps to frame it and make it stand out against the paper.
